column5: Sitting in the van. Waiting for my fishing partner to show. No response on his cell. Not looking good.  He's never done this to me but I did it to him once.  Karma.
Bummer. Im on coffee time, heading out soon. Its 317am here  Smash his window???
Uh oh terry is up! Where are you and brian off too?
4:13 a,m, . maybe for duck or deer hunting, for fishing I prefer the late biters, Good luck , anyways
We are on Simcoe. 2 for 3 so far
Thread jack lol  You guys after trooots?
We are on Simcoe. 2 for 3 so far Film at 11??
We never have that problem Terry and I. We set a time. My time and his time.
Film at 11??  Film will be shortly after cleaning. LOL

Well - he surfaced at 4:30 and all was fine. Had a decent day in Niagara area (US side). Got a few lakers, a dozen nice smallies and a zillion silver bass.  Oh and we both got sea sick and had to retreat to shore for a half hour. What a day. Lol.

Well - he surfaced at 4:30 and all was fine. Had a decent day in Niagara area (US side). Got a few lakers, a dozen nice smallies and a zillion silver bass.  Oh and we both got sea sick and had to retreat to shore for a half hour. What a day. Lol.   Boy, did you jump the gun eh. LOL  I was on the water this morning at 5am. I knew my bud would be there 6am or so. No show,hey, fish on bro, fish on. Lifes to short.

I worked with a guy who was famous for canceling at the last minute.. I would make plans a week or so in advance and he would let me down.. I have a family and he was single so it was tough for me to find time to go fishing.... I vowed the last time it happened that I would never fall for it again so I won't ever fish with him again..
How about the guy that texts ya at 1230, got the day off, be over in 20 mins lol (wormdunker)  Then shows up late?????  Must of got lost in the big city of emo?
